_header: Go piteous heart razed with deadly woe
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 478.
_description: John Skelton, Disconsolate love, ‘at the instance of a nobyll lady’ — two stanzas rhyme royal with refrain
